translation.en: Is it true that you were on TV yesterday?

translation.twi: Mepɛ mmuae tee, nanso biribiara nni hɔ bio.

translation.en: Did you know that some foxes lived on this mountain?
translation.twi: So na wunim sɛ wɔn mu binom te bepɔw yi so?

translation.en: Were you aware that foxes once lived on this mountain?
translation.twi: So na wunim sɛ wɔn mu binom te bepɔw yi so?

translation.en: Did you hear that foxes used to live up here?
translation.twi: So na wunim sɛ wɔn mu binom te bepɔw yi so?

translation.en: Do you know anything about training dogs?
translation.twi: So wunim ɔkwan bi a wɔfa so tete akraman?

translation.en: Are you familiar with how to train dogs?
translation.twi: So wunim ɔkwan bi a wɔfa so tete akraman?

translation.en: Do you have any knowledge about dog training?
translation.twi: So wunim ɔkwan bi a wɔfa so tete akraman?

translation.en: Kwame Jackson is actually not the manager.
translation.twi: Nokwarem no, nsɛm ho amanneɛbɔ Kwame Jackson nyɛ adwuma no so panyin.

translation.en: In fact, Kwame Jackson is not the manager.
translation.twi: Nokwarem no, nsɛm ho amanneɛbɔ Kwame Jackson nyɛ adwuma no so panyin.

translation.en: The truth is, Kwame Jackson is not the boss.
translation.twi: Nokwarem no, nsɛm ho amanneɛbɔ Kwame Jackson nyɛ adwuma no so panyin.

translation.en: He is an unpleasant fellow.
translation.twi: Ɔyɛ yɔnko a n'asɛm yɛ mmɔbɔ.

translation.en: He is not a nice person.
translation.twi: Ɔyɛ yɔnko a n'asɛm yɛ mmɔbɔ.

translation.en: He is raher disagreeable.
translation.twi: Ɔyɛ yɔnko a n'asɛm yɛ mmɔbɔ.

translation.en: I've done everything you asked me to.
translation.twi: Mayɛ biribiara a woka kyerɛɛ me no.

translation.en: I have completed all the tasks you gave me.
translation.twi: Mayɛ biribiara a woka kyerɛɛ me no.

translation.en: I did everything you told me to.
translation.twi: Mayɛ biribiara a woka kyerɛɛ me no.

translation.en: Don't let the cat out.
translation.twi: Mma aboa no kwan mma ɔnkɔ.

translation.en: Keep the cat inside.
translation.twi: Mma aboa no kwan mma ɔnkɔ.

translation.en: Don't allow the cat to go out.
translation.twi: Mma aboa no kwan mma ɔnkɔ.

translation.en: We're starving.
translation.twi: Ɔkɔm rekum yɛn.

translation.en: We are famished.
translation.twi: Ɔkɔm rekum yɛn.

translation.en: We are really hungry.
translation.twi: Ɔkɔm rekum yɛn.

translation.en: She will come back before long.
translation.twi: Ɔbɛsan aba nnansa yi ara.

translation.en: She will return soon.
translation.twi: Ɔbɛsan aba nnansa yi ara.

translation.en: It wont be long before she comes back.
translation.twi: Ɔbɛsan aba nnansa yi ara.

translation.en: It takes one to know one.
translation.twi: Egye obi na wahu emu biako.

translation.en: Only someone like that would recognize it in another.
translation.twi: Egye obi na wahu emu biako.

translation.en: You would have to be the smae to spot it.
translation.twi: Egye obi na wahu emu biako.

translation.en: I have not been busy since yesterday.
translation.twi: Efi saa bere no, minni adagyew koraa.

translation.en: I havent had anything to do since yesterday.
translation.twi: Efi saa bere no, minni adagyew koraa.

translation.en: I have been free since yesterday.
translation.twi: Efi saa bere no, minni adagyew koraa.

translation.en: I'm seeing ghosts.
translation.twi: M'ani wɔ me ho so paa.

translation.en: I keep imagining spirits.
translation.twi: M'ani wɔ me ho so paa.

translation.en: I feel like I am seeing apparitions.
translation.twi: M'ani wɔ me ho so paa.

translation.en: I tried twice, but neither try worked.
translation.twi: Mebɔɔ mmɔden mprenu, nanso emu biara anyɛ yiye.

translation.en: I made two attempts but both failed.
translation.twi: Mebɔɔ mmɔden mprenu, nanso emu biara anyɛ yiye.

translation.en: I tried two times but it did not work either time.
translation.twi: Mebɔɔ mmɔden mprenu, nanso emu biara anyɛ yiye.

translation.en: She is my dream girl.
translation.twi: Ɔyɛ me babea a meso no dae.

translation.en: She is the girl of my dreams.
translation.twi: Ɔyɛ me babea a meso no dae.

translation.en: She is the one I have always wished for.
translation.twi: Ɔyɛ me babea a meso no dae.

translation.en: They're nice kids.
translation.twi: Wɔyɛ mmofra pa.

translation.en: They are good children.
translation.twi: Wɔyɛ mmofra pa.

translation.en: They are really sweet kids.
translation.twi: Wɔyɛ mmofra pa.

translation.en: The nurse will tell you how to do it.
translation.twi: ɔyarehwɛfo no bɛkyerɛ wo ɔkwan a wobɛfa so ayɛ saa.

translation.en: The nurse will explain the procedure to you.
translation.twi: ɔyarehwɛfo no bɛkyerɛ wo ɔkwan a wobɛfa so ayɛ saa.

translation.en: The nurse will show you what to do.
translation.twi: ɔyarehwɛfo no bɛkyerɛ wo ɔkwan a wobɛfa so ayɛ saa.

translation.en: Women love that.
translation.twi: Mmea ani gye ho saa.

translation.en: Ladies really like that.
translation.twi: Mmea ani gye ho saa.

translation.en: Most women enjoy that.
translation.twi: Mmea ani gye ho saa.

translation.en: I like reading books.
translation.twi: M'ani gye nhoma akenkan ho.

translation.en: I enjoy reading.
translation.twi: M'ani gye nhoma akenkan ho.

translation.en: Reading books is something I like.
translation.twi: M'ani gye nhoma akenkan ho.

translation.en: She has a very good figure.
translation.twi: Ɔwɔ suban pa ankasa.

translation.en: She has a nice body shape.
translation.twi: Ɔwɔ suban pa ankasa.

translation.en: She is well built.
translation.twi: Ɔwɔ suban pa ankasa.

translation.en: It's going to rain, for sure.
translation.twi: Nokwarem no, osu bɛtɔ.

translation.en: It is definitely going to rain.
translation.twi: Nokwarem no, osu bɛtɔ.

translation.en: Rain is surely on the way.
translation.twi: Nokwarem no, osu bɛtɔ.

translation.en: We've got to find a new babysitter.
translation.twi: Ɛsɛ sɛ yehu akokoaa foforo bi a wɔawo no foforo.

translation.en: We need to look for another babysitter.
translation.twi: Ɛsɛ sɛ yehu akokoaa foforo bi a wɔawo no foforo.

translation.en: It is necessary we find another babysitter.
translation.twi: Ɛsɛ sɛ yehu akokoaa foforo bi a wɔawo no foforo.
